languages.text: "Очевидцы показали немногое. Между покойным и убийцей состоялась краткая беседа, после чего Леди Кибелла обезглавила Хирургеона Маджорис. Детали разговора свидетели не слышали".

traits.locale_text: "Согласно свидетельствам очевидцев, во время недолгого разговора Леттард Фориус активно жестикулировал и гневно кричал в лицо культистке о том, что ей следует знать свое место. Вскоре он был обезглавлен. Иных деталей разговора никто не слышал".

languages.text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."
languages.original_text: "Очевидцы показали немногое. Между покойным и убийцей состоялась краткая беседа, после чего Леди Кибелла обезглавила Хирургеона Маджорис. Детали разговора свидетели не слышали".

traits.locale_text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Lady Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

"The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Lady Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

"The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

"The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

languages.text: « Les différents témoignages ne nous ont pas appris grand-chose. Le défunt et son assassin ont eu une brève conversation, à la suite de laquelle maîtresse Kibellah a décapité le chirurgeon majoris. Les témoins n'ont pas entendu les détails de la conversation. »
languages.original_text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

traits.locale_text: « Les différents témoignages ne nous ont pas appris grand-chose. Le défunt et son assassin ont eu une brève conversation, à la suite de laquelle maîtresse Kibellah a décapité le chirurgeon majoris. Les témoins n'ont pas entendu les détails de la conversation. »

languages.text: «Los testigos oculares no aportan gran cosa. El difunto y su asesina hablaron brevemente, después de lo cual la maestra Kibellah decapitó al Cirujano Majoris. Ninguno de los testigos llegó a escuchar la conversación».
languages.original_text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

traits.locale_text: «Los testigos oculares no aportan gran cosa. El difunto y su asesina hablaron brevemente, después de lo cual la maestra Kibellah decapitó al Cirujano Majoris. Ninguno de los testigos llegó a escuchar la conversación».

languages.text: 「目撃者の証言からは、たいしたことは分かりませんでした。故人と犯人は短い会話を交わして、その後、キベラ氏がチラ－ジョン・マジョリスの首をはねたのです。目撃者は詳しい会話の内容を聞いておりません」
languages.original_text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

traits.locale_text: 「目撃者の証言からは、たいしたことは分かりませんでした。故人と犯人は短い会話を交わして、その後、キベラ氏がチラ－ジョン・マジョリスの首をはねたのです。目撃者は詳しい会話の内容を聞いておりません」

languages.text: “目击者并没有给我们太多信息。死者与凶手进行了简短的交谈，之后绮贝菈便砍掉了船医总管的头。目击者没有听到谈话的任何细节。”
languages.original_text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

traits.locale_text: “目击者并没有给我们太多信息。死者与凶手进行了简短的交谈，之后绮贝菈便砍掉了船医总管的头。目击者没有听到谈话的任何细节。”

languages.text: "Die Aussagen der Augenzeugen haben nicht viel gebracht. Der Verstorbene und die Mörderin hatten ein kurzes Gespräch, nach dem Herrin Kibellah den Chirurgeum Majoris enthauptet hat. Die Zeugen haben keine Einzelheiten des Gesprächs gehört."
languages.original_text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aussagen der Augenzeugen haben nicht viel gebracht. Der Verstorbene und die Mörderin hatten ein kurzes Gespräch, nach dem Herrin Kibellah den Chirurgeum Majoris enthauptet hat. Die Zeugen haben keine Einzelheiten des Gesprächs gehört."

languages.text: "Görgü tanıkları da bize pek yardımcı olmadı. Rahmetli ile katilin kısa bir konuşması olmuş. Ardından Kibellah Hanım, Başcerrah'ın kafasını kesmiş. Tanık, konuşmanın ayrıntılarını duyamamış."
languages.original_text: "The eyewitness accounts didn't give us much. The deceased and the murderer had a brief conversation, following which Mistress Kibellah beheaded the Chirurgeon Majoris. The witnesses did not overhear any details of the conversation."
